Negative_Review: First room offered didn t have a bath as per our booking It was next to the entrance and very noisy both from traffic and from the receptionist talking on the phone The second was up 2 flights of stairs but there are no lifts in the building Breakfast was great but there was the danger of being run over while crossing a busy road getting to it There is no restaurant or bar on the premises Fire safety was great galvanised sprinkler pipes run throughout the building suspended from the ceiling in full view In a 4 star hotel I would expect to see only the nozzles placed discreetly through the ceiling Two of the spindles on the stairs to our room were broken presenting a safety hazard to small children
Positive_Review: This visit was to celebrate our wedding anniversary The staff laid out a rose petal love heart on our bed for the occasion The room was not as we booked and when we asked for one as per booking we were upgraded to a club room Our bags were carried up for us as there are no lifts Breakfast was great with a good choice of menu items and the staff in the restaurant were very polite and helpful

Negative_Review: Everything is Ok I will recommend this hotel to my friends It s in a quite neighborhood Very good location
Positive_Review: The location is prime The room is comfortable but the bathroom is too small maybe because we have big bathroom in our country

Negative_Review: There was no lift and my room was at the very top floor The fact that there was no lift was not clear when I was making the booking Also I was told at the time of booking that my card would not be charged prior to my arrival but when I arrived at the hotel it had already been charged This was an inconvenience Also when I made the reservation it stated that breakfast was not included so I made other arrangements whilst when I arrived at the hotel I was told by the staff that breakfast was included For me that was the third inconsistency that I would have preferred not to encounter I told the staff that they needed to ensure Booking was aware of these but they told me that I had to take this up with Booking myself
Positive_Review: The location was excellent The room was tiny but clean

Negative_Review: The shower was excellent but took a little bit of working out Not really a negative though
Positive_Review: Great breakfast choice and glad it was included in the price otherwise it is quite expensive The staff were excellent throughout We had booked to stay in the Shaftesbury Suites but were upgraded to the sister Marble Arch Hotel Montcalm just up the road Room was on the lower ground floor and was the quietest room we have ever stayed in in London Would definitely consider staying again

Negative_Review: The only problem is the lack of a lift but there is a porter on hand to help carry your luggage up
Positive_Review: The receptionist noted that my birthday was coming up at the weekend When I went to breakfast next morning full English was very good I was presented with pancakes with Happy Birthday written in chocolate which was totally unexpected I can t fault the level of customer service

Negative_Review: Small room Not inherently a problem and likely to be expected in pricey crowded London
Positive_Review: Shaftesbury Suites is a very short walk from Marble Arch and Hyde Park It s in an absolutely lovely West End neighborhood with lots of amenities and a 15 minute tube ride to the Square Mile heart of London downtown The rooms are nice if small The staff is friendly and very helpful

Negative_Review: Unfortunately although the food at breakfast was good service was a bit muddled i e we had to wait a long time for the tea and then we had to ask for cups
Positive_Review: Staff very pleasant and helpful and excellent location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff is genuinely nice and kind I felt welcome and in general it was a lovely experience I enjoyed my time in London and surroundings Be careful and book immediately a larger room instead of the single room since the rooms are not very spacious

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Efficient service from Ana when system had doubled booked a lot of rooms She organised taxi transport to sister hotel and a complimentary room upgrade

Negative_Review: Breakfast took too long to be prepared waited more than 15 mins one of the waitress she was pregnant to specify who she is was miserable no smile no tact approach customer with no smile was a burden to do the extra mile to please also has to change hotel to use hotel facilities after a nice sauna and swim one has to cross the road to go to ones room Breakfast is too expensive for what we have consumed When ones pays a package as expensive as we did breakfast should be free without any charge
Positive_Review: Easy access to my business meetings clean hotel comfortable great shower fruits in room etc

Negative_Review: No elevator breakfast is soo limited staff has a very large gap of communication to the extent that they asked me 3 times for payment of rooms Lack in pipes of toilets resulted in a floor full of water day and night
Positive_Review: Location room spaces

Negative_Review: Had to go few doors down for breakfast arrived room had to change as fan outside constant noise very loud you could not read sleep or hear tv was changed to smaller room less facilities no bath so very dissapointed as 4 day stay i think could have made sure room ok or moved To similar staff came check was noisy did best they could
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Massive room great breakfast no lift but only on 3rd floor 54 steps added to my Fitbit Staff are very helpful and the room had proper windows That opened

Negative_Review: Bedding for a baby cot There was a baby box but no pillow or proper bedding for child Otherwise everything was great
Positive_Review: Location is just few munites from Marble Arch You can walk to shopping street easily Free upgrade to a club room and the room was clean and had almost everything in it including microwave The staffs were very nice and friendly as well

Negative_Review: This not a four star hotel at all the room is normal there no elevator the room are not sound proof the shower was leaking for a very very long time after using it and many other things Overall this not a four star hotel and doesn t worth the value When a I visit the city I found out many hotels around the property with the same value or very letter more but it s very much better than Shaftesbury suites
Positive_Review: The staff were good and some of them were helpful

Negative_Review: Small room Hidden entrance Went to the address on booking and notice hotel entrance was actually 1 block away The lock on our door was not functioning well got locked out for awhile after a long shopping day Breakfast Staffs were not helpful at all We asked for two sunny side up eggs and wait 20 mins still not ready We need to catch the flight so we left without the breakfast We asked two staffs if our food is ready neither of them care Poor expreince
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: I didn t get the two extra hours of late check out for being a genius member
Positive_Review: The staff was really friendly The location was awesome just a minute or 2 from oxford street and the marble arch Breakfast was really good and great wifi connection I would definately book again

Negative_Review: Breakfast taken at sister hotel as it s a small boutique hotel was a little noisy on staircase as other guests coming and going outside door
Positive_Review: Comfy bed great location Free upgrade was a bonus

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fresh fruit and complimentary water in the bedroom a short walk to Hyde park for a run plus a powerful shower made this hotel stay perfect for overcoming jet lag The staff were very friendly and helpful and the location is convenient for business restaurants site seeing and shopping the hotel is a short walk from Oxford Street

Negative_Review: I found check in was different to others having to go to the sister hotel to checkin then back again to room
Positive_Review: Location of hotel was great and the room was spacious We used this hotel because of the price and was not let down

Negative_Review: Room was too small and expectations were nothing like the pictures
Positive_Review: The location was amazing if you are planning on shopping in Central London The room was clean but so small Also Croissants were amazing D

Negative_Review: The prices for simple snacks such as chocolate bars and peanuts that were 6 each
Positive_Review: Room bed and facilities were great Slept wonderfully nice and quiet in a quaint town style house

Negative_Review: I recall the hotel information saying there was no lift only 3 floors when said done but the stairs are tricky if you do not have full mobility and that should be a little more prominent However the staff did help with our luggage without being asked and that was a great help Also breakfast is taken at a sister property approx 100 yards up the street which needs to be highlighted we were lucky in that it was cold but clear when it s raining it could be problematic Are umbrellas provided in that circumstance may be a nice touch
Positive_Review: Good location for Marble Arch and the variety of public transport links to get around the sites and the West End

Negative_Review: Pity the hotel doesn t have a lift
Positive_Review: The room was very spacious and the shower very comfortable and nicely warm The breakfast was very good especially the freshly baked croissants The staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fantastic service from every single member of staff they were all lovely and friendly and attentive to our every need The breakfast was delicious and the complimentary spa was just what we needed at the end of our shopping trip Definitely stay here again thank you

Negative_Review: Very small so even a double room couldn t have two seat places The stairs from downstairs were heavy The hotel is definitly to be recomended but ask for a room on the ground floor
Positive_Review: Fantastic location and a modern room very good equiped The staff was fantastic

Negative_Review: anyone going up or down the stairs the noise was very loud into our room because of the old building structure Breakfast was served in a sister hotel a 2 minutes walk away so wasnt the best option in the freezing morning
Positive_Review: spacious room good location great staff

Negative_Review: The breakfast area could be better and the space available utilized better The actual breakfast selection considering the star rating of this property was poor Staff were helpful and tried to please
Positive_Review: We were upgraded to the property at 31 Great Cumberland Place Room was excellent and bed very comfy Location is excellent Staff at reception were very efficient

Negative_Review: They were having some staffing problems at breakfast inexperienced staff
Positive_Review: Great location comfortable rooms very clean all is there what you d need We had a street view room but the street is so quiet that we slept with the window wide open Breakfast is very good a buffet an order of choice from the menu

Negative_Review: Breakfast is served at their sister hotel about 1 min down the road Room safe broken power plug seems yo have been removed
Positive_Review: Small and compact but clean and sufficient

Negative_Review: The worst room we ve ever stayed in 271 a night for an attic room on the 6th floor with no lift This wasn t a suite it was a broom cupboard Central London with only single glazed windows therefore traffic noise kept us awake throughout the night Very disappointing and misrepresented by the image and details on website Requested earlier check in which hadn t been communicated
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Breakfast room in different hotel Not a problem in it self but staff here was a bit stressed out not enough tables so we had to wait to be seated for breakfast
Positive_Review: Good location room was good size friendly staff

Negative_Review: how they can rate it as a 4 star hotel no gym no bar a tiny reception and no restaurant and the rate is very high in compare with other real 4 stars hotel
Positive_Review: the stuff

Negative_Review: With valid booking they did not have any room so that upgraded Us to Montcalm 31 great cumberland street which is not 5 stars but 2 stars max Room907 with window to internal corridor only noisy and you cannot open the door as it is blocked by the bed Room 904 you cannot see 1 3 of the tv from the bed as it isbehind the wall so why such a big tv Room 906 the ventilator in the bathroon did not work all 4 days so it was difficult and uncomfortable for use In none of the 3 rooms safes worked for 2 days and all of them were removeable as these were not connected to anything Finally they repaired two of them but then batteries finished in both of them and had to be repaired again problem was that we were waiting for our computers for more than 3 hours as the pre prepared push buttons on the phone did not work but there was no info that you should push 0 instead and you do not expect that as it worked in the third room room 906 So Montcalm is very bad experience They reported to have problems with our credit card but the bank confirmed in writing that they even did not try as there is not any evidence in the bank
Positive_Review: Apples at the reception and Czech and Slovak receptionists

Negative_Review: No one mentioned you had to walk up the road for Breakfast
Positive_Review: very nice room mentioned it was our Anniversary and got a complimentary bottle of wine Swan towels on the bed nice little touch

Negative_Review: Not having to go down the road to main hotel for breakfast and to pay for extras would have been nice
Positive_Review: Great room in a central location and great range of essentials in the room

Negative_Review: no elevator and the room on 4th floor The breakfast is in another hotel and the restausternt is small and the stuff are nice but not professional
Positive_Review: The room The stuff

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was just perfect for us stuff value location everything Thank you very much for such a welcoming and nice stay We will definitely come back Wishes

Negative_Review: no lift expected to walk up 4 floors with luggage No onsite breakfast had to go to another hotel for it neither of which mentioned on the website or Booking com site had to get printed invoice from another of their hotels 4 for a bottle of water at a price that is too high for what is at best a 2 star hotel
Positive_Review: location

Negative_Review: our apartment was quite noisy because we were on the ground floor at reception plus the photos advertised was for a superior suite
Positive_Review: location was perfect

Negative_Review: No elevator and pretty tight with space in the corridors entrance
Positive_Review: Breakfast was one minutes walk from the Hotel but was good nice premises friendly staff and the food held a good standard The room was clean and cozy An extra thanks to the friendly staff especially Mr Kowsar

Negative_Review: the size of the room of single bed
Positive_Review: yes the bed very nice and the staff very very very nice especially one male Indian named kawther who guided me with in a very nice way to my examination place on his computer so also the other staff very nice realy i enjoy the good hospitality of them

Negative_Review: Tiniest of rooms I had booked a single room but didn t expect it to be so small and cramped Expected better even in London for 200 plus
Positive_Review: Good breakfast but had to go to the sister hotel along the street for it Free wi if

Negative_Review: The photos on Booking com were misleading We wanted a room with a living area sofa etc so I choose the Deluxe room which in the pictures showed this So paid and checked in then taken to a much smaller room and was told it was a Deluxe room it is the Club rooms that have the Sofas etc
Positive_Review: Rooms were spotless modern and to a high standard

Negative_Review: The staff didn t seem to know what they were doing got the room keys muddled up both in the evening and the next day
Positive_Review: Rooms were clean and comfortable good location have stayed in better hotels in London however when we booked this this hotel came up as one of the most reasonable in terms of price The room was very quiet as this hotel is off the main street

Negative_Review: Don t like my credit card used by swipe machine Keeping paper copy of details Not necessary

Negative_Review: Inspite of confirming the booking a day in advance when we reached we were told to shift to Kensington as the hotel was full But after some deliberation they shifted us to Montclam But there after we were very well taken care of and were upgraded and given compliment breakfast as well Excellent staff very helpful and polite
Positive_Review: Very close to the shopping areas

Negative_Review: Kept asking about mini bar usage even though I told them the fridge wasn t even stocked on my arrival Booked a room specifically with a bath but there was only a shower
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Nothing You cannot improve on excellence
Positive_Review: It was the best service that I ve ever encountered Professional and super slick Nothing was any trouble and they were genuine and I could feel their really wanting to please Excellent staff and hotel I cannot fault it nor describe it any better Fantastic price for London and excellent location Spotlessly clean and excellent breakfast Beautiful staff

Negative_Review: Our bedroom was booked as Deluxe we were given a room in the basement which was barely a double Breakfast was not on site but had to walk several yards to a different hotel good job it wasn t raining
Positive_Review: The breakfast was good just at another hotel

Negative_Review: Had to go to another location for breakfast 3rd bed not made up only one lot of towels room ridiculously small cramped for three adults to sleep in
Positive_Review: Lovely bathroom good breakfast

Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: Nicely appointed bedroom although a little on the small side for a double deluxe comfy bed excellent shower Breakfast very good cooked to order Staff friendly and very helpful Would stay there again

Negative_Review: We didn t stay there as our rooms had been sold on for a higher price We were moved to another hotel Not impressed Although the manager was good The room we were given didn t not match what I had booked
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Our room was in the basement it was tiny no room to move for 2 of us I don t usually mind as I feel a room is a base for our weekend in London but this was tiny The bathroom was decorated lovely however again no space to move around We booked in advance which I thought was a lot of money however I m glad we did as the room price trebled I would have never paid the latter amount not that I could afford to
Positive_Review: Nice breakfast Great location Comfy bed Friendly staff

Negative_Review: Although we had checked the day before and everything was OK When we arrived Saturday we were told the rooms were double booked and the receptionist was uninterested in our problem The next 9 approx couples that arrived were all told the same The Manager wanted to ship us to a hotel the other side of London Only the fact they had debited my card the day before got them to put us in a sister hotel down the road The room was tiny By the time all this was sorted we missed the first 90mins of our concert I wouldn t be surprised if our original rooms were given to a wedding party at their neighbouring hotel
Positive_Review: Not a lot See next comment

Negative_Review: The flooring was dated and needed some repair The room although adequate was on the small side
Positive_Review: The location was perfect close to Marble Arch and everything that London has to offer Breakfast was included with our booking and was excellent

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff Excellent location Prepared a surprise to my daughter celebrating her 15th birthday rose petals on the bed forming happy birthday balloons everywhere and a delicious cake with fruits and flowers Would stay there next time in London

Negative_Review: Rooms were alittle small Expensive for 2 nights
Positive_Review: Great location Rooms compact alittle too small but fine for a couple of nights Very clean Breakfast was ok English continental buffet pancakes etc Friendly staff Overal good but rooms rather small for the money

Negative_Review: I think if there was an elevator it would have been easier
Positive_Review: The staff was so friendly with comfy bed the Internet in rooms was excellent the location was amazing near most restaurantsuccessful and shopping areas and the great Hyde Park the pastries at breakfast were delicious and freshly baked

Negative_Review: They put us in a different hotel without the facilities we had booked and expected Never got beyond reception so cannot review Shaftsbury Suites They moved us without giving us an option a supposed upgrade We had booked a club room with a kitchenette as we wanted to do picnics so seemed the perfect solution for our needs The room we were given in different hotel was basic and fridge didn t even work When we told them we weren t happy with accommodation and wanted room in hotel we had booked they had already filled with other people and we were stuck with what we got
Positive_Review: The location was good as we were there for events in Hyde Park

Negative_Review: Bigger rooms Suite is a bit far fetched Our room was more like a small double room

Negative_Review: Small entrance staircase in the hotel we ended up at breakfast was served in another building staff at breakfast could speak better English and have been more helpful staff at reception not all that well informed etc

Negative_Review: This place is not big luggage friendly as there is no elevator It is not really nursing mummy friendly as well as I need to almost need to beg to keep my 1 week worth of breastmilk in the freezer

Negative_Review: Everything tv not working for had hour when I check in too size was rubbish never again
Positive_Review: Nothing really room very small looks nothing like the pictures on ur site

Negative_Review: I liked everything An area of improvement would be more coaching for F B staff at breakfast they were a bit lost at times but with excellent caring skills thou

Negative_Review: Good that they offer complementary apples and water However the apples look and taste plastic May be change these to eco friendly

Negative_Review: The full English breakfast was average not the best we ve had in a hotel of this calibre but there was a nice selection of Continental items

Negative_Review: The short walk to breakfast Not really a problem in good weather

Negative_Review: Overall Very very limited choice of food for breakfast
Positive_Review: More variety plsssssss ur buffet breakfast was sooooo limited Very disappointed for the price of room tat I paid

Negative_Review: Didn t state that breakfast is at sister hotel up the road but it s only 50yds and on the same side so not a big deal

Negative_Review: I booked a deluxe sgle room it was so small I honestly couldn t move in it Then there was a slight incident with the shower I expressed my disappointment with the room was moved to a very big room with double bed etc However I got caught in the rain the staff let me use a room to get changed in It was a sgle room but bigger than the sgle room I was originally given I booked a deluxe sgle room but obviously was not given one Many Thanks Chris
Positive_Review: Amazing staff Would particularly like to mention the Indian guy at No 41 He was just marvellous

Negative_Review: Bed was a little soft as I like a harder bed but big and still comfortable
